titleStmt.title: Refreshing streams flowing from the fulnesse of Jesus Christ. In severall sermons, / by William Colvill sometime preacher at Edenburgh.
titleStmt.author: Colvill, William, d. 1675.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for Joseph Cranford, at the sign of the Phœnix in St Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: "The mystery of contentation in and through Christ" (Thomason E.815[3]) has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
The 2 final leaves are an advertisement leaf and a blank leaf.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Nou: 6th"; "Nouemb. 6. 1654."; the V in imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Phœnix in St Pauls Church-yard.
